title: News24.com | Americans told to wear masks over virus breathing spread fears
description: The US government has begun advising people to wear masks if they go outside, pointing to research that shows the coronavirus could be spread just by breathing.
content:
The US government has begun advising people to wear masks if they go outside, pointing to research that shows the coronavirus could be spread just by breathing.
The advice came as America logged another huge rise in its death toll, almost 1,500 in one day, a… [+4618 chars]
